page.title: 11The Glasshouses.
page.content: Market gardening is very important in the area where we live. There are lots of firms with huge areas covered by glasshouses. The glasshouses are used to grow lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes and peppers. On our way to the glasshouses we passed houses and farms. Our teacher called in at the main building. He met the manager who said he was too busy to show us round because it was their busiest time of the year. The manager said he would contact us when he was less busy but fortunately our teacher knew one of the glasshouse workers and he promised to tell us something about working in the glasshouses. This is what he told us. "We grow many different types of vegetables. It all depends on the season. For example, in Summer we grow cucumbers, tomatoes and peppers.
